title-register: Become a partner, be one of our mexican craftsmans!
description-register: We form a community of Mexican artisans who want to bring their products to the whole world.
meta-descrip: Become a partner and send your craft anywhere in the world
information: We want to empower more and more all the artisans of this country who fail to have the exposure they deserve. It is very gratifying to be able to help and be part of this process.
title-info: Take your product where you always wanted
textarea: Tell us a little bit about you and your business
name: Your Name
help: We will contact you to tell you all the requirements and benefits
